sentence.Network_en: There isn't time to dig deeply and put in manure or compost.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有时间来深挖然后施以粪肥或堆肥.

sentence.Network_en: A green manure is a crop grown mainly to improve soil fertility.
sentence.Network_cn: 种植绿肥作物主要是为使土壤更加肥沃.

sentence.Network_en: If farm - yard manure is used it must be well rotted.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果使用农场的粪肥,必须让它完全腐烂.

...绿肥编辑﻿ [lǜféi]绿肥(green manure)是用作肥料的绿色植物体，绿肥是一种养分完全的生物肥源，种绿肥不仅是增辟肥源的有效方法，对改良土壤也有很大作用，但要充分发挥绿肥的增产作用，必须做到合理施用，<.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a verb in the sense 'cultivate (land'): from Anglo-Norman French mainoverer, Old French manouvrer (see manoeuvre). The noun sense dates from the mid 16th cent

entry.def: Manure is animal faeces, sometimes mixed with chemicals, that is spread on the ground in order to make plants grow healthy and strong.

means.word_mean: 1. any animal or plant material used to fertilize land especially animal excreta usually with litter material

sentences.en: If farm-yard manure is used it must be well rotted.
